thread.title: FBI Warns Jubilant Chicago Cubs Fans About Counterfeit Championship Gear
thread.title_full: FBI Warns Jubilant Chicago Cubs Fans About Counterfeit Championship Gear - WSJ

author: Shibani Mahtani
title: FBI Warns Jubilant Chicago Cubs Fans About Counterfeit Championship Gear
text:
CHICAGO—The Chicago Cubs may have finally reversed the curse after more than 100 years, but the FBI says fans looking to buy celebratory mementos for the holidays could still taste defeat if they aren’t careful.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation’s Chicago office warned in an unusual note to fans of the World Series Champions this week that “counterfeiters may see this as a good opportunity to take advantage of their excitement and...
